
## Notation

- $\pikx = \postk$, posterior probability for class $k$, given $x$, in case of 
  binary labels we might abbreviate $\pix = \post$
  
- $\pi_k = \P(y = k)$, prior probability for class $k$, in case of binary 
  labels we might abbreviate $\pi = \P(y = 1)$
  
- $\LLt$ and $\llt$, Likelihood and log-Likelihood for a parameter $\theta$, 
  based on a statistical model
  
- $\fh$, $\hh$, $\pikxh$, $\pixh$ and $\thetah$, learned functions and 
  parameters
